price: 2. Usun Sinaamak keexitan waqdi dudsuta тага keexoo kee midaan.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
